QuestData.Title: Borrowed Power
QuestData.Description:
The land provides. The land thirsts. Invaders devour what we require.
Reclaim what has been consumed. Absorb what remains abundant.
Wings need wind to fly. We need power to ascend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat volatile lured enemies or soak power from pools to reclaim Cosmic Energy to empower Pocopoc.
QuestData.RewardText: Power thrums. A renewal of hope.
